core:description.text: A bold black leather codpiece that makes an unmistakable statement. Crafted from supple, high-quality leather with a smooth finish, this provocative garment offers both structure and comfort. The leather is expertly shaped to provide secure coverage while maintaining a striking silhouette. Features adjustable side straps for a customized fit and is lined with soft fabric for all-day wearability. The rich black color and sleek leather construction combine functionality with daring style.
